Package library.items

Class BookMaster

java.lang.Object
library.items.LibraryItem
library.items.BookMaster
Direct Known Subclasses:
BookAudio, BookElectronic, BookPrinted
public abstract class BookMaster extends LibraryItem
Abstract base class for all types of books in the library system. BookMaster serves as the foundation for specific book types like printed books, audiobooks, and electronic books. It extends the LibraryItem class to inherit common attributes like ID, title, authors, ISBN, and publisher.

  • Constructor Details

    • BookMaster

      public BookMaster(String id, String title, List<Author> authors, String isbn, String publisher)
      Constructor for creating a BookMaster instance. This constructor is used by subclasses of BookMaster.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the book.
      title - The title of the book.
      authors - The list of authors associated with the book.
      isbn - The ISBN of the book.
      publisher - The publisher of the book.
